Function Documentation

int SnmpAgent ( UDPSOCKET *  sock  ) 

Run SNMP agent.

Normally runs in an endless loop, which is only left in case of an error.

Parameters:
sock UDP socket to use.
Returns:
Always -1.
Examples:
snmpd/snmpd.c.
